mapper.sql: id, loginname, password, status, realname, address, telephone, createtime, userimage, flag
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, loginname, password, status, realname, address, telephone, createtime, userimage, flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME}, #{userimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT})

id,
loginname,
password,

realname,

telephone,

userimage,
flag,

mapper.update:
update user
loginname = #{loginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIME},
userimage = #{userimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
